data.name: BegieAde ~a lyric of lie and retribution~
data.detailed_description:
New Releases

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731200
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826160


About the Game

《BegieAde ~A lyric of lie and retribution~》is a J-RPG developed by Planet Pandemic（惑星パンデミック）, published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

Tereza, the captain of kingdom knight, was defeated by the bandit boss Duardo who has got evil power after Tereza's team captured him.
The succubus girl, Lyric, who gave the evil power to Duardo, said she needs Tereza's help to defeat Duardo because he got way too strong that already beyond her control. But in fact, Lyric has her own purpose to get close to Tereza...

Features

  • Animated character
  • Epic storyline with twists and turns
  • Multi-endings
  • Classic J-RPGRPG

data.short_description: Tereza, the captain of kingdom knight, was defeated by the bandit boss Duardo who has got evil power after Tereza's team captured him. The succubus girl, Lyric, who gave the evil power to Duardo, said she needs Tereza's help to defeat Duardo.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy BegieAde ~a lyric of lie and retribution~

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game will appear sexually suggestive content that is not suitable for minors; Please decide whether to play or not.
